quote: The art of communication is the language of leadership.
name: James Humes

quote: Wise men speak because they have something to say; Fools because they have to say something.
name: Plato

quote: Communication - the human connection - is the key to personal and career success.
name: Paul J. Meyer

quote: Eloquence is a painting of the thoughts.
name: Blaise Pascal

quote: The single biggest problem in communication is the illusion that it has taken place.
name: George Bernard Shaw

quote: Communication leads to community, that is, to understanding, intimacy and mutual valuing.
name: Rollo May

quote: The most important thing in communication is hearing what isn't said.
name: Peter Drucker

quote: The best way to solve problems and to fight against war is through dialogue.
name: Malala Yousafzai

quote: We have two ears and one mouth so that we can listen twice as much as we speak.
name: Epictetus

quote: A man's character may be learned from the adjectives which he habitually uses in conversation.
name: Mark Twain

quote: Words are only painted fire; a look is the fire itself.
name: Mark Twain

quote: Words, once they are printed, have a life of their own.
name: Carol Burnett

quote: Honest communication is built on truth and integrity and upon respect of the one for the other.
name: Benjamin E. Mays

quote: If technique is of no interest to a writer, I doubt that the writer is an artist.
name: Marianne Moore

quote: Don't tell me the moon is shining; show me the glint of light on broken glass.
name: Anton Chekhov

quote: The ability to simplify means to eliminate the unnecessary so that the necessary may speak.
name: Hans Hofmann

quote: Language exerts hidden power, like the moon on the tides.
name: Rita Mae Brown

quote: The art of writing is the art of discovering what you believe.
name: Gustave Flaubert

quote: Brevity is the soul of wit.
name: William Shakespeare

quote: The pen is the tongue of the mind.
name: Horace

quote: If you can't convince them, confuse them.
name: Harry S Truman

quote: To hold a pen is to be at war.
name: Voltaire

quote: The strong man is the one who is able to intercept at will the communication between the senses and the mind.
name: Napoleon Bonaparte

quote: Fill your paper with the breathings of your heart.
name: William Wordsworth

quote: There is only one rule for being a good talker - learn to listen.
name: Christopher Morley

quote: Poetry is simply the most beautiful, impressive, and widely effective mode of saying things.
name: Matthew Arnold

quote: Number one, cash is king... number two, communicate... number three, buy or bury the competition.
name: Jack Welch

quote: Words empty as the wind are best left unsaid.
name: Homer

quote: Genius is the ability to put into effect what is on your mind.
name: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quote: Communication is at the very core of our society. That's what makes us human.
name: Jan Koum

quote: Talk low, talk slow and don't say too much.
name: John Wayne

quote: A relationship is based on communication.
name: John Cena

quote: The temple of art is built in words.
name: Josiah Gilbert Holland

quote: You can change your world by changing your words... Remember, death and life are in the power of the tongue.
name: Joel Osteen

quote: Effective communication is 20% what you know and 80% how you feel about what you know.
name: Jim Rohn

quote: Words are, of course, the most powerful drug used by mankind.
name: Rudyard Kipling

quote: Good words are worth much, and cost little.
name: George Herbert

quote: A different language is a different vision of life.
name: Federico Fellini

quote: Good communication is just as stimulating as black coffee, and just as hard to sleep after.
name: Anne Morrow Lindbergh

quote: It usually takes me more than three weeks to prepare a good impromptu speech.
name: Mark Twain

quote: I do not agree with what you have to say, but I'll defend to the death your right to say it.
name: Evelyn Beatrice Hall

quote: The ABC's are attitude, behavior and communication skills.
name: Gerald Chertavian

quote: My belief is that communication is the best way to create strong relationships.
name: Jada Pinkett Smith

quote: It's never what you say, but how you make it sound sincere.
name: Marya Mannes

quote: To listen well is as powerful a means of communication and influence as to talk well.
name: John Marshall

quote: Lack of communication is the key to any successful relationship going wrong.
name: Pepa

quote: Communication and communication strategy is not just part of the game - it is the game.
name: Oscar Munoz

quote: A powerful idea communicates some of its strength to him who challenges it.
name: Marcel Proust

quote: Words are but the signs of ideas.
name: Samuel Johnson

quote: Languages are true analytical methods.
name: Antoine Lavoisier

quote: I often quote myself. It adds spice to my conversation.
name: George Bernard Shaw

quote: This report, by its very length, defends itself against the risk of being read.
name: Winston Churchill

quote: Science may never come up with a better office communication system than the coffee break.
name: Earl Wilson

quote: Society cannot share a common communication system so long as it is split into warring factions.
name: Bertolt Brecht

quote: A man has a property in his opinions and the free communication of them.
name: James Madison

quote: A writer is someone who can make a riddle out of an answer.
name: Karl Kraus

quote: The Internet has brought communities across the globe closer together through instant communication.
name: Mike Fitzpatrick

quote: I have noticed that nothing I never said ever did me any harm.
name: Calvin Coolidge

quote: First learn the meaning of what you say, and then speak.
name: Epictetus

quote: By and large, language is a tool for concealing the truth.
name: George Carlin

quote: Words are but pictures of our thoughts.
name: John Dryden

quote: Everything becomes a little different as soon as it is spoken out loud.
name: Hermann Hesse

quote: Trade is a communication of cultures and values.
name: Jack Ma

quote: If you wish to be a writer, write.
name: Epictetus

quote: Loyalty and communication are always rewarded in sports.
name: Cheech Marin

quote: Listening, not imitation, may be the sincerest form of flattery.
name: Joyce Brothers

quote: To communicate through silence is a link between the thoughts of man.
name: Marcel Marceau

quote: Speak clearly, if you speak at all; carve every word before you let it fall.
name: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Sr.

quote: Photography is more than a medium for factual communication of ideas. It is a creative art.
name: Ansel Adams

quote: Write in recollection and amazement for yourself.
name: Jack Kerouac

quote: Whether you lead a nation, an enterprise, a community, or a family, we are all in the communication business.
name: Robin S. Sharma

quote: People make music to get a reaction. Music is communication.
name: Yoko Ono

quote: It is not the voice that commands the story; it is the ear.
name: Italo Calvino

quote: Today's gossip is tomorrow's headline.
name: Walter Winchell

quote: In the world of words, the imagination is one of the forces of nature.
name: Wallace Stevens

quote: If what is communicated is false, it can hardly be called communication.
name: Benjamin E. Mays

quote: Words are all we have.
name: Samuel Beckett

quote: Self-expression must pass into communication for its fulfillment.
name: Pearl S. Buck

quote: A word carries far, very far, deals destruction through time as the bullets go flying through space.
name: Joseph Conrad

quote: Technique is communication: the two words are synonymous in conductors.
name: Leonard Bernstein

quote: It sounds so trite but in relationships, you have to communicate.
name: Peter Krause

quote: Writing, to me, is simply thinking through my fingers.
name: Isaac Asimov

quote: Man is a creature who lives not upon bread alone, but primarily by catchwords.
name: Robert Louis Stevenson

quote: Writing and cookery are just two different means of communication.
name: Maya Angelou

quote: Quote me as saying I was mis-quoted.
name: Groucho Marx

quote: To say nothing, especially when speaking, is half the art of diplomacy.
name: Will Durant

quote: My generation was born to work with social media - it's a natural part of our communication with the world.
name: Anwar Hadid

quote: I am not a speed reader. I am a speed understander.
name: Isaac Asimov

quote: Every day I try to be in communication with the universe in an unconscious way.
name: Paulo Coelho

quote: It's communication - that's what theatre is all about.
name: Chita Rivera

quote: One's eyes are what one is, one's mouth is what one becomes.
name: John Galsworthy

quote: I believe more in the scissors than I do in the pencil.
name: Truman Capote

quote: Syllables govern the world.
name: George Bernard Shaw

quote: Storytelling is about two things; it's about character and plot.
name: George Lucas

quote: I always find that there is a real communication between voice and violin.
name: Itzhak Perlman

quote: The press is the enemy.
name: Richard M. Nixon

quote: I do love email. Wherever possible I try to communicate asynchronously. I'm really good at email.
name: Elon Musk

quote: Communication is something we all take for granted.
name: Miriam Margolyes

quote: Language is a virus from outer space.
name: William S. Burroughs

quote: Blessed is the man, who having nothing to say, abstains from giving wordy evidence of the fact.
name: George Eliot

quote: I see dance being used as communication between body and soul, to express what it too deep to find for words.
name: Ruth St. Denis

quote: Good communication is as stimulating as black coffee, and just as hard.
name: Anne Spencer

quote: You can't compete globally unless you have appropriate communication skills.
name: James Wolfensohn

quote: The communication of the dead is tongued with fire beyond the language of the living.
name: T. S. Eliot

quote: The more we elaborate our means of communication, the less we communicate.
name: J. B. Priestley

quote: Words that are carefully framed and spoken are the most powerful means of communication there is.
name: Nancy Duarte

quote: In the last analysis, what we are communicates far more eloquently than anything we say or do.
name: Stephen Covey

quote: The desire to write grows with writing.
name: Desiderius Erasmus

quote: Conducting is about communication. You don't play any notes, but you communicate with the musicians.
name: Andris Nelsons

quote: I see so many activists... who are artists because they feel that they have the power of communication.
name: Yoko Ono

quote: I'm the biggest fan of face-to-face communication.
name: Mary Dillon

quote: What's the greatest advice I give? Develop excellent communication skills.
name: Julie Sweet

quote: A common language is a first step towards communication across cultural boundaries.
name: Ethan Zuckerman

quote: Communication is everyone's panacea for everything.
name: Tom Peters

quote: Ninety-eight per cent of all human communication is non-verbal.
name: Timothee Chalamet

quote: Words of comfort, skillfully administered, are the oldest therapy known to man.
name: Louis Nizer

quote: Good writing excites me, and makes life worth living.
name: Harold Pinter

quote: There is a world of communication which is not dependent on words.
name: Mary Martin

quote: No passion in the world is equal to the passion to alter someone else's draft.
name: H. G. Wells

quote: Literature flourishes best when it is half a trade and half an art.
name: William Inge

quote: Be not a slave of words.
name: Thomas Carlyle

quote: Communication is so key.
name: Ashley Tisdale

quote: I believe that writing is derivative. I think good writing comes from good reading.
name: Charles Kuralt

quote: The more articulate one is, the more dangerous words become.
name: May Sarton

quote: I believe in communication; books communicate ideas and make bridges between people.
name: Jeanette Winterson

quote: The thing that we are trying to do at facebook, is just help people connect and communicate more efficiently.
name: Mark Zuckerberg

quote: The break down for kids is communication. Music helps bring that bond.
name: Sheila E.

quote: I don't tweet. I prefer face-to-face communication and sometimes Instagram.
name: Elizabeth Jagger

quote: Polite conversation is rarely either.
name: Fran Lebowitz

quote: No pleasure has any savor for me without communication.
name: Michel de Montaigne

quote: Communication is about being effective, not always about being proper.
name: Bo Bennett

quote: Communication is so much better when people are vulnerable.
name: A. J. McLean

quote: The medium is the message.
name: Marshall McLuhan

quote: Extremists think 'communication' means agreeing with them.
name: Leo Rosten

quote: Why did God give me two ears and one mouth? So that I will hear more and talk less.
name: Leo Rosten

quote: I think honest communication, no matter where it comes from, is positive for a relationship.
name: Ron White

quote: Journalism is literature in a hurry.
name: Matthew Arnold

quote: One must be frank to be relevant.
name: Corazon Aquino

quote: In communications, familiarity breeds apathy.
name: William Bernbach

quote: The waste basket is the writer's best friend.
name: Isaac Bashevis Singer

quote: It seems a long time since the morning mail could be called correspondence.
name: Jacques Barzun

quote: Wise people say nothing in dangerous times.
name: John Selden

quote: No ideas and the ability to express them - that's a journalist.
name: Karl Kraus

quote: Bad human communication leaves us less room to grow.
name: Rowan Williams

quote: Metaphors have a way of holding the most truth in the least space.
name: Orson Scott Card

quote: The new artists coming through were very materialistic and Hollywood, not so engaged in communication.
name: Patti Smith

quote: Music is the social act of communication among people, a gesture of friendship, the strongest there is.
name: Malcolm Arnold

quote: History has demonstrated that efforts to censure and control communication will not succeed.
name: Ricardo Salinas Pliego

quote: I always felt it was necessary to keep up some kind of communication with other people.
name: Norman Lloyd

quote: The biggest lesson I've learned by living abroad for the last four years is the importance of communication.
name: Hidetoshi Nakata

quote: Oaths are but words, and words are but wind.
name: Samuel Butler

quote: He that communicates his secret to another makes himself that other's slave.
name: Baltasar Gracian

quote: I think that humor has become a principle means of communication among Americans about politics.
name: P. J. O'Rourke

quote: There must be a reason why photographers are not very good at verbal communication. I think we get lazy.
name: Annie Leibovitz

quote: Writing is the supreme solace.
name: W. Somerset Maugham

quote: Silence is only frightening to people who are compulsively verbalizing.
name: William S. Burroughs

quote: If you're like me, food is a medium for communication. It's an expression of love and affection.
name: Lidia Bastianich

quote: As a communication medium, social media is a critical tool for terror groups to exploit.
name: James Comey

quote: Strangely enough, I really think that shoes are a communication tool between people.
name: Christian Louboutin

quote: Pure truth cannot be assimilated by the crowd; it must be communicated by contagion.
name: Henri Frederic Amiel

quote: My wife and I have built trust with our children and have always had open communication.
name: Rick Springfield

quote: We have to teach girls communication skills.
name: Rachel Simmons

quote: I feel that the great challenge of our time is the communication of ideas.
name: Alain de Botton

quote: One has to grow up with good talk in order to form the habit of it.
name: Helen Hayes

quote: Humor is the affectionate communication of insight.
name: Leo Rosten

quote: Who speaks to the instincts speaks to the deepest in mankind, and finds the readiest response.
name: Amos Bronson Alcott

quote: I think the greatest challenge between child and parent is communication.
name: Sean Covey

quote: With my natural communication abilities, I could probably gather a crowd even without the Spirit.
name: Francis Chan

quote: Private communication systems have been around since the beginning of human culture.
name: John McAfee

quote: In my teaching, I enjoyed creating models to clearly communicate my thoughts.
name: Erno Rubik

quote: I grew up in an atmosphere where words were an integral part of culture.
name: Wole Soyinka

quote: Writing only leads to more writing.
name: Sidonie Gabrielle Colette

quote: What I think works for Fox News is we have a very direct form of communication.
name: Roger Ailes

quote: Berlusconi is a genius in communication. Otherwise, he would never have become so rich.
name: Umberto Eco

quote: Most people have to talk so they won't hear.
name: May Sarton

quote: For a writer only one form of patriotism exists: his attitude toward language.
name: Joseph Brodsky

quote: I like people who refuse to speak until they are ready to speak.
name: Lillian Hellman

quote: I have a very open line of communication with both my children.
name: Gloria Estefan

quote: As a company grows, communication becomes its biggest challenge.
name: Ben Horowitz

quote: The key to high-quality communication is trust, and it's hard to trust somebody that you don't know.
name: Ben Horowitz

quote: I hate the amount of communication, the obligation that you have just by owning a phone.
name: Lucas Till

quote: Scientology helps me in acting to focus on communication.
name: Erika Christensen

quote: The need to write comes from the need to make sense of one's life and discover one's usefulness.
name: John Cheever

quote: People seem to see no difference between an intimate conversation and a conversation at the water cooler.
name: Mike Farrell

quote: I enjoy very much communication. I think that scientists need to communicate.
name: Anthony Fauci

quote: For me, becoming a man had a lot to do with learning communication, and I learned about that by acting.
name: Adam Driver

quote: I slept for four years. I didn't study much of anything. I majored in something called communication arts.
name: Don DeLillo

quote: One thing I've learned to appreciate as I've gotten a little older is direct forms of communication.
name: Billy Corgan

quote: The level of communication you can achieve with an infant is really profound.
name: Mayim Bialik

quote: A good catchword can obscure analysis for fifty years.
name: Wendell Willkie

quote: Communication is an issue where we can improve, and if I can do anything to help, I am happy to.
name: Ellen Stofan

quote: There are certain words which are nearer and dearer to a man than any others.
name: Nikolai Gogol

quote: Language cares.
name: Howard Nemerov

quote: Teenagers try to hide what's really going on in their communication online.
name: Ethan Zuckerman

quote: Nearly every communication method we invent eventually conveys unwanted commercial messages.
name: Jamais Cascio

quote: I try to just communicate what I want done as clearly and simply as possible.
name: Dick Wolf

quote: Strange about parents. We have such easy access to them and such daunting problems of communication.
name: James Merrill

quote: What I like in a good author is not what he says but what he whispers.
name: Logan Pearsall Smith

quote: There's been nobody who stays in more communication and listens to veterans more than I do.
name: Rodney Frelinghuysen

quote: I'm a big believer in communication.
name: J. B. Bickerstaff

quote: Without a possibility of change in meanings human communication could not perform its present functions.
name: Kenneth L. Pike

quote: Language commonly stresses only one side of any interaction.
name: Gregory Bateson

quote: Communication is important.
name: Douglas Booth

quote: The way you communicate an idea is different than the way you communicate a product.
name: Frank Luntz

quote: Music is a very personal and emotional form of communication.
name: Trevor Dunn

quote: Fashion shows are really my way of communication.
name: Dries van Noten

quote: That was when I realised that music is the most profound, magical form of communication there is.
name: Lesley Garrett

quote: The communication is in the work and words are no substitute for this.
name: Mary Martin

quote: The thing I do, really, is a communication with audiences more than any achievement through records.
name: Richard Thompson

quote: What's clear - and exciting - is that communication for social change is growing.
name: Aaron Koblin

quote: Honest communication is a rare thing.
name: Taylor Sheridan

quote: Every improvement in communication makes the bore more terrible.
name: Frank Moore Colby

quote: Writing is learning to say nothing, more cleverly each day.
name: William Allingham

quote: Words and pictures can work together to communicate more powerfully than either alone.
name: William Albert Allard

quote: My two daughters live on Facebook, and social media is their mode of communication.
name: Tony Goldwyn

quote: Sometimes there is a greater lack of communication in facile talking than in silence.
name: Faith Baldwin

quote: Corporate communications will become a high-tech art, just as political communication is for Obama.
name: Tina Brown

quote: When you stop talking, you've lost your customer. When you turn your back, you've lost her.
name: Estee Lauder

quote: I was always writing. I've always been attracted to words and stories, communication.
name: Lucy Dacus

quote: What we are going to offer is not a one-way communication, but one-to-one communication.
name: Douglas Alexander

quote: There's a high level of communication between all of us at Marvel, and between Marvel and Lucasfilm.
name: Jason Aaron

quote: Everything I try to do wants to be able to push communication through the notion of the visual image.
name: Peter Greenaway

quote: Writing is a communication.
name: Theodore Sturgeon

quote: After all, it's the future of business communication that we're looking toward.
name: Jim Barksdale

quote: Walt put everything he knew about communication with images into the park, so it was very familiar.
name: John Hench

quote: I majored in political science and speech communication.
name: Marne Levine

quote: We don't communicate in full sentences anyway. We don't need all those words.
name: Shepard Smith

quote: The nations of the West hope that by means of steam communication all the world will become as one family.
name: Townsend Harris

quote: Power in America today is control of the means of communication.
name: Theodore White

quote: Loving your language means a command of its vocabulary beyond the level of the everyday.
name: John McWhorter

quote: Poetry is the communication through words of certain experiences that can be communicated in no other way.
name: John Drinkwater

quote: Why do we have to live with divides between different types of communication?
name: Lars Rasmussen

quote: The way communication works is changing.
name: Hubert Burda

quote: A communication highway without content is inconceivable.
name: Hubert Burda

quote: My mother and I always had full adult communication.
name: Erin Gray

quote: A lot of the music editing job is communication and working out what a director really wants the music to be.
name: Steven Price

quote: Communication is number one, and we have to communicate honestly and openly with each other.
name: IronE Singleton

quote: Illiteracy is rampant. People are out of communication.
name: Karen Black

quote: Every month I do a webcast for 55,000 people, and it's a great tool, great communication vehicle.
name: Terry J. Lundgren

quote: The goal of art-making in general is communication.
name: Will Cotton

quote: Just open, honest communication is the best thing in the world.
name: Brett Davern

quote: Language is memory and metaphor.
name: Storm Jameson

quote: If listeners aren't carried away to Heaven, I'm failing.
name: La Monte Young

quote: A Web site is the only medium of semipermanent communication where you can express yourself.
name: David Rusenko

quote: Communication is very important. And the arts do that, whether it's film or theater.
name: Anne Archer

quote: Tim and Fritz Lang I loved working with. Not Hitchcock so much. There was no communication.
name: Sylvia Sidney

quote: I've always thought of writing as sort of active communication.
name: Lily King
